thread.title: Morgan Stanley Hires Three Financial Advisers
thread.title_full: Morgan Stanley Hires Three Financial Advisers - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Morgan Stanley Hires Three Financial Advisers
text:
Morgan Stanley hired three financial advisers in August, including one from Barclays PLC’s U.S. wealth-management division.
Adviser Louis Greif, from Barclays, joined Morgan Stanley in New York, a spokeswoman for the firm said Tuesday. William Goettert and John Entenberg, from Citigroup Inc.’s private bank, joined in Boca Raton, Fla.
